frame.name: Activity_stop
frame.framedefinition: An Agent ceases an Activity without completing it.
frame.lexunit: discontinue an action, practice, or habit
bring or come to an abrupt stop
come or bring to an end; stop
give up (an action or practice) completely. [FN: this is distinct from abandoning a belief]

fe.name: Agent
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies Agent that stops the Activity.

fe.name: Activity
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Activity that the Agent stops.

fe.name: Circumstances
fe.fedefinition: Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants.

fe.name: Containing_event
fe.fedefinition: This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.

fe.name: Degree
fe.fedefinition: This FE describes the completeness of stopping.

fe.name: Depictive
fe.fedefinition: This FE is used for a Depictive phrase describing the actor or undergoer of an action.

fe.name: Duration
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the length of Time during which the Activity is stopped.

fe.name: Event_description
fe.fedefinition: n general, this FE is used for phrases that describe the clause of the target as a whole.

fe.name: Explanation
fe.fedefinition: The reason the Agent stops the Activity.

fe.name: Frequency
fe.fedefinition: This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A Frequency expression answers the question how often. It is to be distinguished from Iteration, which pertains simply to the number of times an event occurs-Iteration expressions answer the question how many times.

fe.name: Manner
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Manner in which the Agent stops the Activity.

fe.name: Means
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Means by which the Agent stops the Activity.

fe.name: Particular_iteration
fe.fedefinition: Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.

fe.name: Place
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Place where the Agent stops the Activity.

fe.name: Purpose
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Purpose for which an Agent stopped the Activity.

fe.name: Re_encoding
fe.fedefinition: This FE presents the current frame as an integral part of a larger conceptualization expressed by another frame.

fe.name: Result
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Result of the stopped Activity.

fe.name: Subevent
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the last Subevent of the stopped Activity.With the arrival of the bishop, everyone stopped working.

fe.name: Time
fe.fedefinition: This FE identifies the Time when the Agent stops the Activity.
